abstract: Apple has failed to prevent its competitor Samsung from selling a touchscreen tablet in Australia. An Australian court lifted a temporary sales ban on Samsung’s tablet, in time for the holiday shopping season.
snippet: Apple has failed to prevent its competitor Samsung from selling a touchscreen tablet in Australia. An Australian court lifted a temporary sales ban on Samsung’s tablet, in time for the holiday shopping season.
lead_paragraph: Apple has failed to prevent its competitor Samsung from selling a touchscreen tablet in Australia. An Australian court on Friday lifted a temporary sales ban on Samsung’s tablet, in time for the holiday shopping season, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Samsung Wins a Round in Patent Fight With Apple
